General.Name: Jinli Group Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Jinli Group Holdings Limited designs, manufactures, and sells fashion casual and sports shoes in China. It also designs and sells casual wear, including jeans and accessories. The company sells its products through agents and footwear traders. Jinli Group Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2010 is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: Ugland House, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1104
